forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.
